name: Tesla Model 3 sticker design
description:
After watching this tutorial on how to turn a picture into a line drawing in Illustrator, I decided to apply the learning and create a line drawing of the Tesla Model 3 in Figma.


The car is available in 6 colours:

  • White
  • Grey
  • Black
  • Red
  • Blue
  • and my favourite colour Yellow


Feel free to use this to make stickers or t-shirts! If you do let me know on twitter @Alborz.design

That'd make me really happy :)
